name: Joker and Sayori Commit Arson Hells Door
name_original: Joker and Sayori Commit Arson Hells Door
description:
It happened, the sequel to the hit game "Joker And Sayori Commit Arson" is finally released! In this game you raid hell and kill Satan with the main characters Joker and Sayori in this "super intense" rpg. With a "super rich story", it will be sure to bring joy and tears to anyone. The music is filled with heavy metal and demonic noises that aren't mine so feel free to enjoy it.

credit to the assets that aren't mine

Joker sprites by angel-of-britannia

Sayori sprites by Goldfang

All music can be found by searching their title on youtube.
